description: Number of n-step spirals on cubic lattice.
references: A. J. Guttmann and K. J. Wallace, On three-dimensional spiral anisotropic self-avoiding walks, J. Phys. A 18 (1985), L1049-L1054.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
G. Szekeres and A. J. Guttmann, Spiral self-avoiding walks on the triangular lattice, J. Phys. A 20 (1987), 481-493.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
